alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:14PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Yavapai County, including Yarnell and Walnut Grove, through 445 PM MST... At 413 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Walnut Grove to near Yarnell to near Congress. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Congress, Walnut Grove, Wagoner, Yarnell and Glen Ilah. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 258 and 270, and between mile markers 273 and 278. State Route 71 between mile markers 105 and 109. Highway 93 between mile markers 186 and 193. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
